entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
